title: Markets Update: Investor Sentiment Tilts Marginally Bullish and Pro-Cyclical
description: Jason Mathews of Goldman Sachs’ Global Markets Division explains what the futures market indicates about investors’ outlook for the election and another round of U.S. fiscal stimulus.
itunes:author: Goldman Sachs
itunes:summary: Jason Mathews of Goldman Sachs’ Global Markets Division explains what the futures market indicates about investors’ outlook for the election and another round of U.S. fiscal stimulus.
